item.title: Ice-T Defends Gun Rights: "The Last Form Of Defense Against Tyranny" | RealClearPolitics
item.description: Ice-T Defends Gun Rights: "The Last Form Of Defense Against Tyranny": MEDIAITE: Speaking with Channel 4 London's... http://t.co/qXmenTdX
item.content:encoded: Ice-T Defends Gun Rights: "The Last Form Of Defense Against Tyranny": MEDIAITE: Speaking with Channel 4 London's... http://t.co/qXmenTdX MEDIAITE: Speaking with Channel 4 London√¢ÔøΩÔøΩs Krishnan Guru-Murthy in the hours after the Colorado news broke, the self-described √¢ÔøΩÔøΩGodfather of Gangsta Rap√¢ÔøΩÔøΩ vehemently denied a connection between gun rights and the Aurora murders. √¢ÔøΩÔøΩIt√¢ÔøΩÔøΩs legal in the United States,√¢ÔøΩÔøΩ the rapper said. √¢ÔøΩÔøΩThe right to bear arms is because that√¢ÔøΩÔøΩs the last form of defense against tyranny. Not to hunt. It√¢ÔøΩÔøΩs to protect yourself from the police.√¢ÔøΩÔøΩ √¢ÔøΩÔøΩAnd do you see any link between that and this sort of instance?√¢ÔøΩÔøΩ Guru-Murthy challenged. √¢ÔøΩÔøΩNo. Not really,√¢ÔøΩÔøΩ Ice-T responded. √¢ÔøΩÔøΩIf somebody wants to kill people, they don√¢ÔøΩÔøΩt need a gun to do it.√¢ÔøΩÔøΩ √¢ÔøΩÔøΩMakes it easier though, doesn√¢ÔøΩÔøΩt it?√¢ÔøΩÔøΩ the host pushed back. √¢ÔøΩÔøΩNot really. You can strap explosives on your body. They do that all the time.√¢ÔøΩÔøΩ Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: realclearpolitics.com

item.content:encoded: A Syrian Bloodbath Revisited: Searching for the Truth Behind the Houla Massacre: Initially, the United Nations w... http://t.co/tWfo5JwT Initially, the United Nations was convinced that the Syrian government was behind the brutal Houla massacre. But then, some began to have doubts. SPIEGEL traveled to the town to interview survivors and witnesses -- and was able to reconstruct the horrifying slaughter. Link - Trackbacks
